content: We have a client that wants us to return our 400 and 500 errors with a Bundle of OperationOutcomes. Any hapi exception that is thrown either takes an operationoutcome or creates one and sends it back. Is it even POSSIBLE for an exception to be returned as a bundle of OperationOutcomes? I have a feeling that it's not possible. It also doesn't seem like valid FHIR.
is anyone able to assist with this?

You might need to map the http codes to http://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-issue-type.html codes.
Many http codes like 403 have something similar in OperationOutcome, like forbidden
@Kevin Mayfield , I'm not sure if I'm understanding you correctly. How will that allow me to return a bundle of operationoutcomes for exceptions?
